title: Neighborhood Events
blurb: South Boise Village hosts events throughout the year that bring neighbors togetherâ€”community cleanups, park gatherings, meetings, and seasonal celebrations. Everyone is welcome to attend.

events.title: Spring Neighborhood Cleanup
events.description: Join neighbors for our annual spring cleanup. Bags, gloves, and refreshments will be provided. All ages welcome.

events.title: April Board Meeting
events.description: Monthly SBVNA board meeting. Neighbors are encouraged to attend and participate.
